languages.text: "Тассера — не то, за что ее пытаются выдать. На самом деле это не феодальный мир с примитивным населением, а мир-кузня. Или индустриальный мир. Все ради того, чтобы платить подать меньше!"
"Thassera is not what they are making it out to be — not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a forge world. Or else, an industrial one. The point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"
languages.original_text: "Тассера — не то, за что ее пытаются выдать. На самом деле это не феодальный мир с примитивным населением, а мир-кузня. Или индустриальный мир. Все ради того, чтобы платить подать меньше!"

traits.locale_text: "Thassera is not what they are trying to make it seem. Not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a Forge World. Or else an Industrial one. And the point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"

"Thassera is not what they are trying to make it seem. Not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a Forge World. Or else an Industrial one. And the point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"
"Thassera is not what they are making it out to be — not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a Forge World. Or else, an Industrial one. The point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"

"Thassera is not what they are making it out to be — not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a forge world. Or else, an industrial one. The point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"

languages.text: "Thassera ist nicht, was es zu sein Vorgibt. Es ist keine Feudalwelt mit einer primitiven Bevölkerung, sondern eine Fabrikwelt. Oder eine Industriewelt. Der Zweck der Täuschung ist, einen niedrigeren Zehnt zu bezahlen!"
languages.original_text: "Thassera is not what they are making it out to be — not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a forge world. Or else, an industrial one. The point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"

traits.locale_text: "Thassera ist nicht, was es zu sein Vorgibt. Es ist keine Feudalwelt mit einer primitiven Bevölkerung, sondern eine Fabrikwelt. Oder eine Industriewelt. Der Zweck der Täuschung ist, einen niedrigeren Zehnt zu bezahlen!"

languages.text: « Ils cachent la véritable nature de Thassera. Ce n'est pas un monde féodal à la population primitive, mais un monde forge. Ou un monde industriel, peut-être. Dans tous les cas, ils mentent pour réduire le montant de la dîme qu'ils doivent payer ! »
languages.original_text: "Thassera is not what they are making it out to be — not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a forge world. Or else, an industrial one. The point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"

traits.locale_text: « Ils cachent la véritable nature de Thassera. Ce n'est pas un monde féodal à la population primitive, mais un monde forge. Ou un monde industriel, peut-être. Dans tous les cas, ils mentent pour réduire le montant de la dîme qu'ils doivent payer ! »

languages.text: 「タッセーラは、彼らが装っているような惑星ではない。原始的な住民を抱えた封建惑星などではなく、工業惑星だ。あるいは産業惑星かもしれない。この偽装の目的は、納める租税を少なくすることだ！」
languages.original_text: "Thassera is not what they are making it out to be — not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a forge world. Or else, an industrial one. The point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラは、彼らが装っているような惑星ではない。原始的な住民を抱えた封建惑星などではなく、工業惑星だ。あるいは産業惑星かもしれない。この偽装の目的は、納める租税を少なくすることだ！」

languages.text: «Thassera no es lo que aparenta. No es un mundo feudal con una población primitiva, sino un mundo forja o posiblemente un mundo industrial. ¡El objetivo del engaño es pagar un diezmo menor del debido!».
languages.original_text: "Thassera is not what they are making it out to be — not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a forge world. Or else, an industrial one. The point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"

traits.locale_text: «Thassera no es lo que aparenta. No es un mundo feudal con una población primitiva, sino un mundo forja o posiblemente un mundo industrial. ¡El objetivo del engaño es pagar un diezmo menor del debido!».

languages.text: “塔瑟拉实际上并不像看起来这么简单。它并不是原始的封建世界，而是铸造世界，或者至少是工业世界级别。他们之所以要这样瞒天过海，就是为了少交什一税！”
languages.original_text: "Thassera is not what they are making it out to be — not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a forge world. Or else, an industrial one. The point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"

traits.locale_text: “塔瑟拉实际上并不像看起来这么简单。它并不是原始的封建世界，而是铸造世界，或者至少是工业世界级别。他们之所以要这样瞒天过海，就是为了少交什一税！”

languages.text: "Thassera, öyle iddia ettikleri gibi ilkel nüfusa sahip bir feodal dünya değil. Burası bir döküm dünyası, hatta sınai dünya. Daha az aşar ödeyebilmek için bizi kandırmaya çalışıyorlar!"
languages.original_text: "Thassera is not what they are making it out to be — not a feudal world with a primitive populace but a forge world. Or else, an industrial one. The point of the deception is to pay a smaller tithe!"

traits.locale_text: "Thassera, öyle iddia ettikleri gibi ilkel nüfusa sahip bir feodal dünya değil bir döküm dünyası, hatta sınai bir dünya. Daha az aşar ödeyebilmek için bizi kandırmaya çalışıyorlar!"
